Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: shaheerasif8008-cmyk
Message:
üöÄ Major Forge1 Platform Update: Azure Monitor Integration & Dependency Fixes

‚ú® New Features:
- Complete Azure Monitor OpenTelemetry integration with analytics
- Advanced business intelligence and dashboard capabilities
- Comprehensive OSS systems integration (Celery, Redis, Weaviate, etc.)
- Employee lifecycle management with full API endpoints
- Multi-tenant security and compliance framework
- Production-ready deployment configurations

üîß Technical Improvements:
- Fixed Docker build issues by removing unavailable dependencies
- Added graceful degradation for optional components
- Implemented comprehensive error handling and logging
- Enhanced performance monitoring and optimization
- Added extensive test suites and validation scripts

üìö Documentation:
- Complete setup and deployment guides
- API documentation and troubleshooting guides
- Azure Monitor integration documentation
- Comprehensive README files and examples

üõ°Ô∏è Security & Compliance:
- Multi-tenant isolation and data protection
- GDPR and HIPAA compliance frameworks
- Advanced audit logging and encryption
- Security middleware and policy enforcement

üß™ Testing & Validation:
- Comprehensive test suites for all components
- Integration tests and performance benchmarks
- Startup validation and health check scripts
- End-to-end workflow testing

This update makes Forge1 production-ready with enterprise-grade observability,
security, and scalability features.

Description: Possible Kubernetes Secret detected, posing a risk of leaking credentials/tokens from your deployments
Match:
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: employee-secrets
  namespace: employee-lifecycle-staging
  labels:
    app: employee-lifecycle
    environment: staging
type: Opaque
data:
  # Base64 encoded secrets - replace with actual values
  DATABASE_URL: cG9zdGdyZXNxbDovL3VzZXI6cGFzc0BkYi1zdGFnaW5nOjU0MzIvZW1wbG95ZWVfc3RhZ2luZw==
